amendment.description: To provide for the development of a student loan clearinghouse.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2366 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2366 proposed by Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S9724-9727; text: CR S9724-9725) To provide for the development of a student loan clearinghouse.
